title: [LiveLogger] Advertise during preview
body: Fixes #8428 ### Context As LiveLogger enters preview we are interested in users using it and receiving feedback. As this is an opt-in behavior, the new feature needs to be advertised. ### Changes Made A `DeferredBuildMessage` with the legend "Try out the new LiveLogger using the switch -livelogger or -ll" is displayed whenever the LiveLogger is supported but not used. ### Testing Manual testing. ### Notes

commit.message: Added deferred build message to advertise logger
Store value of DoesEnvironmentSupportLiveLogger to avoid duplicate DeferredBuildMessages
